name: Interactive Video Player
description: Interactive video player for Black Mirror: Bandersnatch with choice-based navigation and branching storylines. Enables choose-your-own-adventure playback directly within Jellyfin.
overview: Transform your Jellyfin into an interactive video experience with this plugin that adds choice-based navigation to Black Mirror: Bandersnatch. Features include keyboard controls, speed management, subtitle support, and state persistence across sessions.

versions.changelog: Initial release: Full interactive video support with choice-based navigation, keyboard controls (F/R/Space/Arrows/0/Enter/S), speed management (0.25x-4x), embedded English subtitles, state persistence, and comprehensive API endpoints. Plugin builds to 315KB with all dependencies. Compatible with Jellyfin 10.8.0+ and .NET 6.0+.
